722775f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 119th Street
722775f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, north from West 119th Street, showing bioyclers near
General U.S. Grants Tomb. This photograph was published by the Department
of Parks in a booklet on the occasion of the opening of the West Side
Improvement Project on October 12, 1937.
About 1900.
Cift of Department of Parks.
